name: WebServerTemplate
description: This is a Web Server application, modified from the Spring MVC serving web content tutorial repository (found [here](https://github.com/spring-guides/gs-serving-web-content)). A Web Server is an application that receives HTTP requests and returns web pages. Spring is a framework that we use to write our web server. It implements a bunch of features that are common to all web servers so we can focus on the portions that unique to our application.
